name: Community College Consortium for Open Educational Resources (CCCOER)
display_name: Community College Consortium for Open Educational Resources (CCCOER)
description: The Community College Consortium for Open Educational Resources (CCCOER) is a joint effort by the OER Center for California, Foothill-De Anza Community College District, the League for Innovation in the Community College, OCW Consortium and many other community colleges and university partners to develop and use open educational resources (OER) and especially open textbooks in community college courses.
